docket_entries.description: Certificate of No Objection Re: Eighth Monthly Application of CP Energy Group, LLC as Investment Banker and Financial Advisor for the Debtors, for Allowance of Compensation for Professional Services Rendered and for Reimbursement of Actual and Necessary Expenses Incurred from December 1, 2009 Through December 31, 2009 (related document(s) 2206 ) Filed by CP Energy Group LLC. (Finocchiaro, Julie) (Entered: 02/16/2010)

Certificate of No Objection Re: Twelfth Monthly Application of Miller & Chevalier Chartered for Allowance of Compensation for Services Rendered and Reimbursement of Expenses as Special Tax Counsel to the Debtors and Debtors in Possession for the Period from December 1, 2009 through December 31, 2009 (related document(s) 2207 ) Filed by Miller & Chevalier Chartered. (Finocchiaro, Julie) (Entered: 02/16/2010)

Order DENYING Debtors' Motion For An Order Directing The Examination Of Witnesses And Production Of Documents From Knowledgeable Parties. (related document(s) 2161, 2163, 2164, 2168, 2169, 2170, 2171, 2172, 2175, 2191, 2200, 2212, 2334 ) Order Signed on 2/16/2010. (BMT) (Entered: 02/16/2010)

Response to Debtors' Twenty-First Omnibus (Substantive) Objection to Claims (related document(s) 2310 ) Filed by Wellborn Cabinet Inc (Courtest Filing) (Finizio, GianClaudio) Modified on 2/16/2010 (Colmyer, Deborah). (Entered: 02/16/2010)

Declaration in Support Statement in Support of the Debtors' Reservation of Rights With Respect to the Applications of the Official Committee of Equity Security Holders for an Order Authorizing the Employment and Retention of Venable LLP and Benesch, Friedlander, Coplan & Aronoff LLP (related document(s) 2250, 2255, 2363 ) Filed by Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors. (Attachments: # 1 Certificate of Service) (Stratton, David) (Entered: 02/16/2010)

Response Debtors' Reservation of Rights with Respect to the Application of the Official Committee of Equity Security Holders for Orders Authorizing the Employment and Retention of (I) Venable LLP as Its Counsel and (II) Benesch, Friedlander, Coplan & Aronoff LLP as Its Delaware and Conflicts Counsel (related document(s) 2250, 2255 ) Filed by Washington Mutual, Inc. (Irgens, Andrew) (Entered: 02/16/2010)
Minutes of Hearing held on: 02/05/2010 Subject: Omnibus. (vCal Hearing ID (105999)). (related document(s) 2313 ) (LMC) Additional attachment(s) added on 2/16/2010 (LMC). (Entered: 02/16/2010)
